Would you like to report this crash? This can help us improve the app! This will not collect any personal information.
No email client detected. Alternatively, you can paste the error message to the app store or Github.
The larger the image, the more demanding it is to view the image in realtime.
Click to modify text or picture

When the feedback problem is valid and is fixed or a new version is added, your name or email will appear in the update log pop-up window. We will obscure your information and the full name will not appear. \\n If you do not want to appear, please mark: I do not want to.

This update brings the following features:

 New 

 ¬∑ A new way of interaction, more beautiful and efficiency has been improved, welcome to taste. 

 ¬∑ Added output format and quality options, easy to use. Fixes 

 ¬∑ The watermark accuracy has been adjusted, except for some cases, are very accurate.
Insufficient memory, please clean up the background and try again
The output Uri is empty, please contact the developer for feedback, thank you
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.

ColorPickerView implements getting HSV colors, ARGB values, Hex color codes from any image drawables or your gallery pictures by tapping on the desired color. Supports alpha & brightness slider bar, dialog, and saving & restoring selected data.

Makes it easy to create a beautiful about screen for your app. Generates an Activity or Fragment. Idea from here: Heinrich Reimer\'s open-source-library-request-manager Design inspired by Phonograph If you use this library in your app, please let me know and I\'ll add it to the list.

Material Components for Android (MDC-Android) help developers execute Material Design. Developed by a core team of engineers and UX designers at Google, these components enable a reliable development workflow to build beautiful and functional Android apps.Material Components for Android is a drop-in replacement for Android\'s Design Support Library.

"Compressor is a lightweight and powerful android image compression library. Compressor will allow you to compress large photos into smaller sized photos with very less or negligible loss in quality of the image. "
Bundled GIFLib via JNI is used to render frames. This way should be more efficient than WebView or Movie classes.
